names.english: sedate the heart and calm the spirit decoction
names.commonEnglish: Sedate the Heart and Calm the Spirit Decoction

actions: Settles anxiety, calms the Spirit, calms the Liver and anchors and preserves Floating Yang.
Heavily settles, calms the Spirit, calms the Liver, benefits Yin and anchors Floating Yang.
Quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Nourishes the Heart Yin and Blood and calms the Spirit.
With Fu Shen, calms the Spirit.
With He Huan Pi, nourishes Heart Blood to Calm the Spirit.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, soothes irritability, nourishes the Blood and calms the Spirit.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies Liver Blood and calms the Spirit
Calms the Spirit, relieves constraint, activates and harmonizes the Blood and regulates Qi.
With Dan Shen and Ye Jiao Teng, for insomnia, depression and irritability.
With Ye Jiao Teng, nourishes Heart Blood to Calm the Spirit.

notes: For difficulty falling asleep, take before bed.
For waking during the night, take before bed and upon waking.
